text: (nabiye!) sæma samuhayakma (e e kalayanta sarilana se) ovunta næmadiya yutu margayak api æti kara tibunemu. ebævin (obage kalayehi obata æti kara tikhena) margaya gæna ovun oba samaga tarka nokala yutuya. tavada oba, ovunva obage deviyan (æti kala margaya) desata aradhana karanu. niyata vasayenma obama rju margayehi sitinnehiya
